thread.title: David Cameron's free childcare pledge is underfunded, says leading thinktank
thread.title_full: David Cameron's free childcare pledge is underfunded, says leading thinktank - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: David Cameron's free childcare pledge is underfunded, says leading thinktank
text: Funding for David Cameron ’s flagship election pledge to give working parents 30 hours a week of free childcare will fall short by £1bn a year, a new report has claimed. The analysis by the IPPR think-tank warns that the cost of doubling
